com.facebook.buck.jvm.java

Class CompileToJarStepFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.jvm.java.CompileToJarStepFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AddsToRuleKey, ConfiguredCompiler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JavacToJarStepFactory, KotlincToJarStepFactory, ScalacToJarStepFactory

    public abstract class CompileToJarStepFactory
extends Object
implements ConfiguredCompiler
    Provides a base implementation for post compile steps.
